Nearly $64 million of @HUDgov #CARESAct funding will help Americans with compromised immune systems by increasing the level of safe, stable housing for persons living with HIV/AIDS and their household members by providing short-term lodging assistance to address isolation needs.

$1 billion of @HUDgov #CARESAct funding will keep America’s homeless citizens safe by building more emergency shelters, providing hotel/motel vouchers for homeless families, and provide essential service to people experiencing homelessness including education and childcare.

$2 billion of @HUDgov #CARESAct funding will help states, communities and non-profits to construct medical facilities for testing and treatment, expand the capacity of hospitals, and support businesses manufacturing medical supplies.
